backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to update the page title in frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the document title and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing navigation between six Valentine-themed steps.
Sticker component showing a calendar icon with a heart accent and romantic text.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeartsSp: Generates animated floating hearts and sparkles with configurable density.
frontend/src/components/HandwritingHeadi: Wrapper component applying a handwriting font to headings.
frontend/src/components/KissStickerBurst: Animated burst of heart-shaped kiss stickers with romantic text overlay.
frontend/src/components/PinkEnvelope.tsx: Interactive pink envelope that reveals a heartfelt letter when opened.
frontend/src/components/PopupModal.tsx: Modal shown after acceptance of the big question, with heart animation and next-step button.
frontend/src/components/RedEnvelope.tsx: Interactive red envelope component that toggles open to reveal custom content.
frontend/src/components/ShareFooter.tsx: Footer providing copy-link functionality and attribution section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing the authenticated/anonymous backend actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, custom animations, and utility classes for the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/steps/BigQuestionStep.tsx: A step component showing a playful Valentine question with moving buttons and a popup modal.
frontend/src/steps/FinalStep.tsx: Displays the final Valentine message with decorative effects and a share footer.
frontend/src/steps/RoseDayStep.tsx: Shows a Rose Day card with an image and navigation to the next step.
frontend/src/steps/SurpriseEnvelopesStep: Renders interactive red envelopes that reveal surprises and leads to the final step.
frontend/src/steps/ValentineNoteStep.tsx: Displays a toggleable Valentine note in a pink envelope and a button to proceed.
frontend/src/steps/WelcomeStep.tsx: Initial welcome screen with a puppy image and a button to continue.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes the current romantic multi‑step website state, requested content updates, page‑flow reorder, and interactive elements. Also lists existing features, architectural notes, and known scope conflicts.
